children.value: Lend to borrowers, save on Oasis, get paid for work, tackle bounties, win prizes, get grant funding... There are loads of ways to earn Dai!
to earn the Dai Saving Rate (DSR). The DSR smart contract, introduced with Multi-Collateral Dai, incentivizes saving. Dai locked in the DSR accrues continuously at a published annual rate.
Earn Dai by learning about it. Some platforms, like
, offer Dai rewards for users that spend time learning about Dai and MakerDAO.Â
Check out listings for jobs that pay in Dai and other cryptocurrencies.
hosts job openings for blockchain enthusiasts. Reddit channels, like
Receive Dai for completing bounty projects. MakerDAO's
are open to anyone, but other platforms, like
Some organizations offer grants funded with Dai. For example, on

is designed to directly support projects that increase Dai adoption.
Earn Dai by lending on platforms like
. Please note, there are risks associated with lending, and users are encouraged to do proper due diligence.
Participate in blockchain developer hackathons. MakerDAOâs
regularly hosts events where winners are paid with Dai.
Compete for Dai in video game tournaments.
, for example, recently hosted a tournament with over 2,100 Dai up for grabs!
